ï»¿RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE To: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Financing (Big Results Now in Education Program) to the United Republic of Tanzania The undersigned Committee corstituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to the United Republic of Tanzaiiia (the Recipient) a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 78,800,000. The objective of the Program is to improve education quality of the Recipient's primary and secondary schools. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the Program in support of which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said Program is designed to promote the economic development of the United Repub [ic of Tanzania and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the United Republi. of Tanzania. 3. Accordingly, the Commiti,ee finds that said Program merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommei ids said Program for such assistance.
ï»¿(The United Republic of Tanzania) - 2 - (Big Results Now in Education Program) COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Nominee selected by Governor for the United Republic of Tanzania Acting Regional Vice President Africa Dated at Washington, D.C. JUN 2 3 2014
